products.name: Coffee Table
products.description: A classic wooden coffee table for a timeless look.
products.detailOne: Enhance your living room with this classic wooden coffee table. Crafted from solid wood, it features a timeless design that blends seamlessly with traditional and transitional decor styles. The sturdy construction ensures durability and longevity, making it a lasting addition to your home.

products.name: italian Sofa
products.description: A luxurious leather sectional sofa for spacious seating.
products.detailOne: Transform your living room with this luxurious leather sectional sofa. Its L-shaped design offers ample seating space, perfect for hosting guests or lounging with family. The premium leather upholstery adds sophistication to your decor while providing exceptional comfort.

products.name: White Armchair
products.description: A mid-century modern armchair with retro charm.
products.detailOne: Add a touch of retro charm to your living space with this mid-century modern armchair. Its sleek silhouette and tapered legs capture the essence of mid-century design, making it a stylish addition to any room. The upholstered seat and backrest offer comfort and support for relaxation.

products.name: New Marble Top Coffee Table gray color
products.description: A sophisticated marble top coffee table for elegant living rooms.
products.detailOne: Enhance your living room with this sophisticated marble top coffee table. The genuine marble surface exudes elegance and luxury, creating a focal point in your decor. Its sturdy base ensures stability while adding a contemporary touch to your interior.

products.name: Wooden Bookcase
products.description: An industrial style bookcase with rustic charm.
products.detailOne: Bring rustic charm to your living space with this industrial style bookcase. Its open shelves and metal frame showcase a blend of modern and vintage aesthetics, making it a versatile piece for storing books, decor, and personal items.

products.name: Velvet Upholstered Bed with pillows
products.description: A luxurious velvet upholstered bed for elegant bedrooms.
products.detailOne: Transform your bedroom into a sanctuary of luxury with this velvet upholstered bed. Its plush headboard and footboard create a focal point, while the sturdy frame provides stability and support. The velvet fabric adds a touch of opulence to your sleeping space.

products.name: Three door Modern Wooden Dresser
products.description: A modern wooden dresser with ample storage.
products.detailOne: Organize your bedroom with this modern wooden dresser. It features multiple drawers and compartments for storing clothing, accessories, and personal items. The sleek design and clean lines add a contemporary touch to your bedroom decor.

products.name: Upholstered Storage Bench
products.description: An upholstered storage bench for practical and stylish seating.
products.detailOne: Add versatility to your bedroom with this upholstered storage bench. It features a cushioned seat upholstered in fabric for comfort and style. The storage compartment beneath the seat offers ample space for blankets, pillows, or other essentials.

products.name: Wooden Bedside Table
products.description: A vintage bedside table with timeless appeal.
products.detailOne: Enhance your bedroom decor with this vintage bedside table. Its compact size fits perfectly next to a bed, providing convenient storage and display space. The classic design and rustic finish add charm and character to your sleeping space.

products.name: Chic Upholstered Headboard with elegent design
products.description: A chic upholstered headboard for stylish bedroom decor.
products.detailOne: Transform your bedroom with this chic upholstered headboard. Its padded design offers comfort and support while adding a touch of elegance to your bed. The upholstered fabric is soft to the touch and available in various colors to suit your decor.

products.name: Sleek Platform Bed with white Pillows
products.description: A sleek platform bed for modern bedroom settings.
products.detailOne: Update your bedroom with this sleek platform bed. Its low-profile design and minimalist aesthetics create a contemporary focal point in any bedroom. The sturdy frame provides reliable support for a restful night's sleep.

products.name: Wooden and whit Wardrobe
products.description: A rustic wooden wardrobe with ample storage space.
products.detailOne: Organize your clothing and accessories with this rustic wooden wardrobe. Its spacious interior features hanging rods, shelves, and drawers for efficient storage. The distressed wood finish adds character and charm to your bedroom decor.

products.name: New Clear Mirrored Vanity Table
products.description: A mirrored vanity table for glamorous bedroom settings.
products.detailOne: Create a glamorous space with this mirrored vanity table. Its reflective surface adds brightness and sophistication to your bedroom decor. The spacious tabletop and drawers provide ample storage for cosmetics, jewelry, and beauty essentials.

products.name: Elegant Chandelier
products.description: An elegant chandelier for adding luxury to any room.
products.detailOne: Illuminate your space with this elegant chandelier. Its crystal accents and polished finish exude luxury and sophistication. The adjustable chain allows you to customize the hanging length for optimal placement in any room.

products.name: wooden Wall Clock
products.description: A vintage wall clock with timeless appeal.
products.detailOne: Add charm to your walls with this vintage wall clock. Its classic design and antique finish create a nostalgic ambiance in any room. The large numbers and hands ensure easy visibility and accurate timekeeping.

products.name: Modern Floor Lamp
products.description: A modern floor lamp for contemporary living spaces.
products.detailOne: Illuminate your space with this modern floor lamp. Its sleek design and adjustable height make it ideal for reading nooks, living rooms, or home offices. The sturdy base ensures stability, while the fabric shade diffuses soft, ambient light.

products.name: Stylish Mirror
products.description: An art deco wall mirror for adding glamour to your walls.
products.detailOne: Make a statement with this art deco wall mirror. Its geometric frame and mirrored panels create a striking visual effect on any wall. The sleek design adds glamour and sophistication to modern and eclectic interiors alike.

products.name: Nordic Style Area Rug
products.description: A Nordic style area rug for cozy living spaces.
products.detailOne: Enhance your living space with this Nordic style area rug. Its soft texture and geometric pattern create a cozy atmosphere in any room. The rug's neutral color palette complements various decor styles, from Scandinavian-inspired to minimalist interiors.

products.name: Bohemian Throw Pillow Set
products.description: A bohemian throw pillow set for eclectic home decor.
products.detailOne: Add a pop of color and texture to your living space with this bohemian throw pillow set. Its vibrant patterns and tassel accents create an eclectic look that complements various decor styles. The pillows are crafted from soft fabrics for comfort and style.

products.name: Geometric Wall Art Set
products.description: A geometric wall art set for modern interiors.
products.detailOne: Update your walls with this geometric wall art set. Its minimalist designs and monochromatic palette add a modern touch to any room. The artworks are framed for a polished look that enhances contemporary interiors.

products.name: Abstract Canvas Art
products.description: A beautiful abstract canvas art piece.
products.detailOne: An abstract canvas art piece that adds color and sophistication to your living space. The bold strokes and dynamic composition make it a focal point in any room.
